ingredients.ingredient: 16 ounces peanut butter sandwich cookies (such as Nutter Butter®)
½ (16 ounce) jar peanut butter (such as Jif®)
½ (24 ounce) package chocolate candy melts

cookingTips: Pulse cookies and peanut butter until mixture holds together like wet sand
Melt chocolate slowly over low heat to prevent seizing and ensure smooth coating
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's your strategy for keeping the chocolate coating smooth and even across all balls?
